name: Farzad Barzin
title: Full Stack Software Engineer
tagline: I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer with a passion for building mobile and web applications and solving problems.
description: I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer with a passion for building mobile and web applications and solving problems. I have experience in building and deploying web applications using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I have also built mobile applications using React Native and deployed them to the App Store and Google Play Store. I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills.
